name: Make Emp Code Prefix
script:
# Fetch the custom company code from the Company doctype
c_code = frappe.db.get_value('Company', doc.company, 'custom_company_code')
# frappe.msgprint(f"Company Code: {c_code}")

# Fetch the custom branch code from the Branch doctype
b_code = frappe.db.get_value('Branch', doc.branch, 'custom_branch_code')
# frappe.msgprint(f"Branch Code: {b_code}")

doc.custom_emp_code_prefix = str(c_code)+"-"+str(b_code)

name: Set checkin date
script:
# formatted_time = frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.time, "yyyy-mm-dd") + doc.time[10:]
# date_time = frappe.utils.get_datetime(formatted_time)
# doc.custom_date = date_time.date()

date_time = frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.time)
doc.custom_date = date_time.date()
